titleStmt.title: The pleasant vvalkes of Moore-fields Being the guift of two sisters, now beautified, to the continuing fame of this worthy citty.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. Jaggard?] for Henry Gosson, and are to be sold at the signe of the Sun in Pater noster Row,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The pleasant walkes of Moore fields.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sun in Pater noster Row
